channel.title: ts on wm's blog
channel.description: Recent content in ts on wm's blog

item.title: Ts常见问题总结
item.description: 1、从一组数组对象中拿到相应值，组成枚举类型 const littleNumbers = [ { a: 1, b: '123' }, { a: 2, b: '22223' }, { a: 3, b: '3123' }, ] as const; // remember 'as const' // littleNumbers[number] 相当于下标 type aLittle = typeof littleNumbers[number]['b'] // aLittle = '123' | '22223' | '3123' let useLittles: aLittle = '3123' 2、找不到第三方模块时，有两种方法可以消除ts的报警 // 1、在加载第三方模块内部声明 declare const yourModuleName: any; // 2、在根目录新建 modules.d.ts declare module 'yourModuleName'; 3、根据key值，约束对应value的值类型 let source = { name: 'lisa', age: 19 } type typeSource = typeof source const getKey = <T extends keyof typeSource>( key: T, value: typeSource[T] ): typeSource[T] => { return value } // error 类型“"123"”的参数不能赋给类型“number”的参数。ts(2345) let bingoAge = getKey('age', '123') // is ok let bingoName = getKey('name', '123') 持续更新中…

item.title: Ts代码片段
item.description: interface定义函数 interface User { name: string age: number } // 定义单个函数，用type定义是个不错的选择 type UserFunc = (user: User) => string const getUserInfo: UserFunc = (user) => { return `name: ${user.name}，age: ${user.age}` } getUserInfo({ name: 'ff', age: 23 }) typeof 探查某个dom/关键字的类型 // 想知道某个dom，关键字(setTimeout)的类型是什么，可用typeof let div = document.createElement('div'); // HTMLDivElement type divType = typeof div let timer = setTimeout(() => console.log('st'), 2) // NodeJS.Timeout type timerType = typeof timer ts高级类型 // 剔除某个键 Omit let person = { name: 'name', hoppy: ['eat', 'sleep'] } type user = Omit<typeof person, 'name'> 持续更新中…
